fullDescription:
The Helm of Transformation and Concealment The Tarnhelm (German: "camouflage helmet" or "concealment helm") is a magical helmet
                    from Germanic legend, most famously featured in Richard Wagner's opera cycle "Der Ring
                    des Nibelungen." This powerful artifact grants its wearer the ability to become invisible,
                    transform into any shape, and teleport instantaneously from place to place.
